name: Ukwlua! (co-op)
description:
A very very buggy game made for GMTK Jam 2022.

Controls:

Red- W, A , S, D to move, C to reload, E to shoot.

Blue- Arrow keys to move, [space] to reroll, M to shoot.

The game is about moving in a not-so-symetrical plot, and trying to shoot your friend in the process. To win the game, The first one to get to 10 score, wins the game. Each player gets a random amount of moves (which include shots) decided by the dice. Once you are out of moves, You can reload the dice. Blocks block bullets and you can hide behind them.
